alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 10:11PM EDT until April 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Michigan... Menominee River near Florence affecting Dickinson, Florence and Iron Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Floodwaters reach a few homes and cottages along Runbers Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday evening to a crest of 10.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early next Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.1 feet on 07/01/1958. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
